thread.title: Deadly blasts hit Shias marking Ashoura in Bangladesh

title: Deadly blasts hit Shias marking Ashoura in Bangladesh
text:
Published By: Al Jazeera - Today 
Twelve-year-old boy killed and 100 wounded in attack on procession of Shia Muslims marking holy day in Dhaka....
